attributes.action: We urge the Government to reform regulations concerning football club ownership
attributes.additional_details: For full background information please visit http://blackpoolsupporterstrust.com/Site/LatestNews.aspx?NewId=117
attributes.background: After the High Court judgement exposing the asset-stripping of Blackpool FC, we urge the Government to reform the regulations concerning football club ownership, as the English Football League seems unable or unwilling to do so.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly how you'd like the regulation of football club ownership to change. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
